price: Kuma wanda ya saye shi daga Masar* ya ce wa mãtarsa, "Ki girmama mazauninsa, akwai tsammãnin ya amfãne mu, kõ kuwa mu riƙe shi ɗã."Kuma kamar wancan ne Muka tabbatar ga Yũsufu, a cikin ƙasa kuma dõmin Mu sanar da shi daia fassarar lũbũru, kuma Allah ne Marinjãyi a kan al'amarinSa, kuma amma mafi yawan mutãne ba su sani ba."
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي ٱشۡتَرَىٰهُ مِن مِّصۡرَ لِٱمۡرَأَتِهِۦٓ أَكۡرِمِي مَثۡوَىٰهُ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَنفَعَنَآ أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُۥ وَلَدٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلِنُعَلِّمَهُۥ مِن تَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحَادِيثِۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَالِبٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: * Yũsufu a gidan sarauta, kuma a cikin hãlin girma da ɗaukaka. Gidan Azĩzĩ Masar, watau firãyim Minista, babban wazĩrin Masar.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhī ish'tarāhu min miṣ'ra li-im'ra-atihi akrimī mathwāhu ʿasā an yanfaʿanā aw nattakhidhahu waladan wakadhālika makkannā liyūsufa fī al-arḍi walinuʿallimahu min tawīli al-aḥādīthi wal-lahu ghālibun ʿalā amrihi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
